meta.title: Helvetic Dynamics AG – Transport, Logistics & Vehicle Trade in Switzerland
meta.description: Helvetic Dynamics AG in Buchs ZH – Your partner for freight transport, logistics, vehicle trade, auto parts, import/export and courier services in Switzerland.
meta.keywords: transport Switzerland, logistics Buchs ZH, freight transport, vehicle trade, auto parts, courier service, import export Switzerland, Helvetic Dynamics AG

hero.title: Reliable Logistics & Transport
hero.subtitle: Your Swiss partner for freight transport, vehicle trade and logistics solutions since 2018.

cta.title: Ready for reliable logistics?
cta.text: Contact us today for a free consultation.

about.label: About Us
about.title: Helvetic Dynamics AG
about.description: Since 2018, we have been providing reliable transport and logistics services across Switzerland from our base in Buchs ZH. As a public limited company (AG) located at Mühlibachstrasse 42, 8107 Buchs ZH, we combine a wide range of services under one roof.
about.text: Our focus is on quality, punctuality and personal service. Whether goods transport, vehicle repair, real estate management or international import and export solutions – we are your reliable partner. With over 7 years of experience in the Swiss market, we offer comprehensive solutions for your logistics and business needs.

advantages.label: Why Us
advantages.title: Your Advantages
advantages.subtitle: What sets us apart and why customers trust us

quality.title: Quality & Reliability
quality.description: Over 7 years of experience guarantee the highest quality standards and timely deliveries.

network.title: Nationwide Network
network.description: Comprehensive coverage throughout Switzerland with reliable partners and efficient routes.

flexibility.title: Flexible Solutions
flexibility.description: Tailored services for every need – from small shipments to large projects.

technology.title: Modern Technology
technology.description: Innovative systems for tracking, planning and communication for optimal transparency.

support.title: Personal Service
support.description: Dedicated support and fast response times – we're always there for you.

experience.title: Proven Expertise
experience.description: Years of experience in transport, logistics and vehicle trade with proven success.

services.label: Services
services.title: What We Offer
services.subtitle: From freight transport to real estate management – we deliver comprehensive solutions for your logistics and business needs.

transport.title: Freight Transport
transport.description: Reliable transport of all types of goods – nationally and internationally, on time and secure.
transport.page_description: Professional freight transport throughout Switzerland. National and international transport solutions for all types of goods.
transport.details: We offer reliable transport of all types of goods, both nationally and internationally. Our fleet and network enable timely and secure deliveries.

logistics.title: Logistics Services
logistics.description: Professional logistics solutions for your supply chain, from storage to final delivery.
logistics.page_description: Comprehensive logistics solutions for your supply chain. From storage to final delivery.
logistics.details: Our logistics services cover the entire supply chain – from storage and picking to final delivery. We optimize your processes for maximum efficiency.

autoparts.title: Auto Parts
autoparts.description: Trade in high-quality auto spare parts – fast availability and fair prices.
autoparts.page_description: Trade in high-quality auto spare parts. Fast availability and fair prices for all vehicle types.
autoparts.details: Our auto parts trade covers a wide range of vehicle types. We offer fast availability and fair prices for original and quality spare parts.

vehicles.title: Vehicle Sales & Repair
vehicles.description: Buying and selling vehicles as well as professional repair and maintenance services.
vehicles.page_title: Vehicle Sales & Repair – Helvetic Dynamics AG
vehicles.page_description: Buying and selling vehicles as well as professional repair and maintenance services.
vehicles.details: We offer comprehensive vehicle services – from buying and selling to professional repair and maintenance. Our experienced team ensures reliable results.

importexport.title: Import & Export
importexport.description: International trade services – we take care of your import and export needs.
importexport.page_description: International trade services for import and export. Professional handling of your international business.
importexport.details: We handle all aspects of international trade – from customs clearance and documentation to the logistical processing of your import and export business.

courier.title: Courier Services
courier.description: Fast and reliable courier and delivery services for your urgent shipments.
courier.page_description: Fast and reliable courier and delivery services for urgent shipments throughout Switzerland.
courier.details: Our courier services offer fast and reliable delivery for urgent shipments. Whether documents, packages or special goods – we deliver on time.

moving.title: Moving Services
moving.description: Professional moving services for private and business customers – careful, reliable and on time.
moving.page_description: Professional moving services for private and business customers throughout Switzerland.
moving.details: We offer comprehensive moving services for private and business customers. From planning and packing to transport – we ensure a smooth move.

realestate.title: Real Estate
realestate.description: Acquisition, administration and sale of real estate, including redevelopment, renovation and construction.
realestate.page_description: Real estate services: acquisition, administration, sale, redevelopment and new construction.
realestate.details: Our real estate service includes the acquisition, administration and sale of real estate. We also support you with redevelopment, renovation and new construction projects.

contact.label: Contact
contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: Have questions or need a quote? We look forward to hearing from you.
